author: james_t_guthridge
post: We of so little fate. God said unto thee I love thee, I love but thee with a love that shall not die Till the moon turns old Till the stars turn cold Till the leaves in the judgement book unfold..
title: Akiane’s Jesus, Heaven is for Real and the Man in the Turin Shroud
